title: Enable DSDS Pixel 3A?
content:
Hi,

I got my Pixel 3A working with esim on T-Mobile. I want to use my work's ATT physical sim card at the same time with DSDS but the option os not available on my 3A running Android 10. I can only use one active network at the same time not both of them.

Is there a way to fix this, to enable DSDS?

Thanks
